attributes.action: Honour the sacrifice of all who fought and died in the First World War,and all Wars by giving the last survivor a State Burial.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Great War symbolises the sacrifices made during War to secure our freedom. Those who fought in this and all Wars should be honoured by laying to rest the last Survivor of The First World War by way of a State Funeral.
